import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Form, Input, Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupText, FormGroup, Label } from 'reactstrap'; const StripeDemo = () => { return (

Stripe Demo

Use this form to send yourself an email! This form utilizes Sendgrid's API to send emails to a single user.

Customized Message

In the real world you'll need to send customized messaging to your clients/users for marketing or followup.

Personalized

It's always best to use your clients name if possible so your messaging seems personalized.

Email Yourself
); }; export default StripeDemo;
